description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nThe Walking Dead:
Your creatures' {CONDNAME_MINION_ZOMBIE} minions now deal damage based on their master's highest stat. In addition, your creatures start battles with 1 {CONDNAME_MINION_ZOMBIE}. This trait does not stack.
name: Watchful Chalice
